content: sturdy & cushy kindle sleeve updated 05/08/12 knit seamlessly from the bottom up the woven stich makes a flat sturdy fabric that is still cushy on the inside from the purl bumps the finished dimensions make a very snug kindle case with the knit stitches on the edges giving just enough stretch to fit the case over the kindle this pattern fits the kindle keyboard aka kindle 3 but can be easily adjusted for other e-readers finished measurements woven pattern knit flat notes 5 x 8 row 1 k1 * s1wyf k1 repeat from * to unfortunately the knitpicks yarn last st end k1 i used is not
